mdRecord.dcterms:description: View of bay windows on house facade

... purchased by the Clinton Woman's Club in 1925 and they continue to maintain the building. ... The main floor highlights various types of lumber throughout each room and it is reported that Mr. Curtis used his home as a sort of portfolio for his lumber business. -- https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/George_M._Curtis_House [work]
